    • Method Detail

      • saveReinforcement

        public void saveReinforcement(Reinforcement rein)
        Saves the reinforcement to the database. If the reinforcement durability is less than or equal to zero it will delete it from the database.
        Parameters:
        The - Reinforcement to save

      • saveInitialReinforcement

        public void saveInitialReinforcement(Reinforcement rein)
        Saves the initial reinforcement into the database.
        Parameters:
        The - Reinforcement to save

      • getReinforcement

        public Reinforcement getReinforcement(org.bukkit.Location loc)
        Returns the Reinforcement from the specified location.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Reinforcement

      • getReinforcement

        public Reinforcement getReinforcement(org.bukkit.block.Block block)
        Returns the Reinforcement from the specified block.
        Parameters:
        block -
        Returns:
        Reinforcement

      • deleteReinforcement

        public void deleteReinforcement(Reinforcement rein)
        Deletes the reinforcement. Should get called from the saveReinforcement method if the durability of the reinforcement is less than or equal to 0.
        Parameters:
        rein -

      • invalidateAllReinforcements

        public void invalidateAllReinforcements()
        Used to flush all the reinforcements to the db on shutdown. Can be called else where if too a manual flush is wanted.

      • getNextReinforcementID

        public int getNextReinforcementID()
        Returns:
        Returns the next reinforcement Id for reinforcements.
